header.default: This exercise is divided into three sections:

contentblock1header.default: Part 1: What options do you prefer?

contentblock1text.default: Share your preferences across a range of offerings within each category.

contentblock2header.default: Part 2: How important is each category?

contentblock2text.default: Rate the importance of each category relative to the others.

contentblock3header.default: Part 3: How would you trade off options?

contentblock3text.default: For pairs of options, tell us how much you prefer one over the other.

note.default: **Helpful tip!** Click on the `` symbol for more information. You will see it on every page on each of the icons.
